bibl.title: Recent Discoveries in al-Haiz (Bahria Oasis).
bibl.note: Excavations and surveys by the Egyptian Antiquities Organization, 1988-1990. - 1. The [Roman] settlement. - 2. The eastern [Christian] chapel. - 3. The western church. - 4. The burials. - 5. Pottery found at al-Haiz.

bibl.title: Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.seg: HAWASS Zahi and Peter GROSSMANN, Recent Discoveries in al-Haiz (Bahria Oasis).
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 32 (1993) pp. 89-110, 16 figg.

Excavations and surveys by the Egyptian Antiquities Organization, 1988-1990. - 1. The [Roman] settlement. - 2. The eastern [Christian] chapel. - 3. The western church. - 4. The burials. - 5. Pottery found at al-Haiz.
